Title: Foundation Theme for Orchard CMS
Description: This is a foundation 4 based theme for Orchard CMS v1.6.1. Foundation is an advanced responsive front-end framework (http://foundation.zurb.com/).
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This is a foundation 4 based theme for Orchard CMS v1.6.1. Foundation is an advanced responsive front-end framework (http://foundation.zurb.com/).

It is based on the original The Theme Machine theme for Orchard. It utilizes the responsive capabilities of Foundation 4 to give you a really advanced responsive theme for Orchard.

Foundation

The theme currently uses Foundation 4. Foundation is an advanced responsive front-end framework. Learn more about Foundation.

Orchard CMS

Orchard is a free, open source, community-focused Content Management System built on the ASP.NET MVC platform. Learn more about Orchard.
